term.title: Flory–Huggins theory

item.text: A thermodynamic theory of polymer solutions, first formulated independently by Flory and by Huggins, in which the thermodynamic quantities of the solution are derived from a simple concept of combinatorial entropy of mixing and a reduced Gibbs energy parameter, the 'χ parameter'.
